result.reason: The docking framework (WeifenLuo.WinFormsUI.Docking) is not correctly handling split panes across multiple monitors, preventing docking on secondary screens, which is a usability bug.
result.approach: Investigate the configuration and usage of the WeifenLuo.WinFormsUI.Docking library within mRemoteNG, focusing on FrmMain.cs and other DockContent implementations, to identify why split panes fail to dock on secondary monitors. This may involve examining how DockPanel instances are created, managed, and how they interact with screen geometry and multi-monitor APIs provided by Windows Forms or the docking library itself.
